Simpson slams weight obsession The star dismissed speculation that she might join Simon Cowell on the judging panel of the upcoming Fox series. Simpson wrote on her Twitter page: Just to clear up a rumour... I am NOT going to judge X Factor!!! I don't even know where that info came from, ( sic ) . A string of high profile names have been linked to the show including Mariah Carey , Nicole Scherzinger and Cheryl Cole . It inspired economists Salvatore Modica and Aldo Rustichini to pontificate thus: A subject is certain of something when he knows that thing; he is uncertain when he does not know it, but he knows he does not... he is unaware of something when he does not know it, and he does not know he does not know.
